text: Norbert Werbs (20 May 1940 – 3 January 2023) was a German Roman Catholic bishop and theologian. He was born in Warnemünde, Rostock. He became a priest in 1964. He was became auxiliary bishop of Hamburg in 1994. He served until his retirement in 2015. Werbs died on 3 January 2023 in Neubrandenburg, at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2023 deaths Category:German Roman Catholic bishops Category:German theologians Category:People from Rostock
title: Norbert Werbs
